member.name: T:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect
member.summary: Represents an anchor in the text editor.

member.name: F:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect.myRange
member.summary: The range we track in the document. Null only until it's initialized by the constructor.

member.name: F:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect.myRangeMarker
member.summary: A marker for the range.

member.name: F:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect.mySink
member.summary: The event sink that listens to the text control events without holding a strong reference upon the anchor. Null after disposal.

member.name: F:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect.myTextControl
member.summary: The text control to which the anchor is attached.

member.name: M:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect.#ctor(JetBrains.TextControl.ITextControl,System.Int32)
member.summary: Anchors to the given range on the given text control.

member.name: M:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect.#ctor(JetBrains.TextControl.ITextControl,JetBrains.Util.TextRange)
member.summary: Anchors to the given range on the given text control.

member.name: M:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect.CreateBeginningOfLine(JetBrains.TextControl.ITextControl,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an anchoring rectangle on the character at the beginning of the line.
member.param: An offset in the text control. The beginning of the line containing this offset at the moment of the call will be tracked.

member.name: M:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect.CreateFromCaretStatic(JetBrains.TextControl.ITextControl)
member.summary: Creates an anchoring rectangle that anchors to the place where the caret was at the instant of the call. “Static” means the anchor would update to accomodate for changes in the document, but won't track caret movement.

member.name: M:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect.CreateFromSelectionStatic(JetBrains.TextControl.ITextControl)
member.summary: Creates an anchoring rectangle that anchors to the place where the selection margin was at the instant of the call. “Static” means the anchor would update to accomodate for changes in the document, but won't track selection changes.

member.name: M:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect.UpdateAnchor
member.summary: Updates the anchoring rectangle as it gets dirty.

member.name: P:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect.Range
member.summary: Gets or sets the range whose rectangle is tracked.

member.name: P:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect.TextControl
member.summary: Gets the text control to which the range belongs.

member.summary: A class that listens to the events without holding the tight.

member.name: F:JetBrains.IDE.TextControlAnchoringRect.TextControlEventSink.myAnchor
member.summary: The anchor object to be notified of the events. Null after the object is disposed of.

member.summary: Creates the event sink. It takes the text control from the anchor and attaches to its events.

member.summary: Attaches to the text control. Called by the ctor.

member.summary: Detaches from the text control. Called by the .

member.summary: Causes the owning anchor to update.

member.summary: On disposal, detaches from the owner and cleans it up.

member.summary: Starts tracking the text control window position, returns a cleanup token.

member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:JetBrains.IDE.TreeBrowser.PreviewSupport
member.summary: Enumerates possible types of preview support in

member.name: F:JetBrains.IDE.TreeBrowser.PreviewSupport.NotSupported
member.summary: Preview is not supported at all

member.name: F:JetBrains.IDE.TreeBrowser.PreviewSupport.Supported
member.summary: Preview is supported. Control will be created through a call to and updated through calls to . Preview is invisible by default.

member.name: F:JetBrains.IDE.TreeBrowser.PreviewSupport.SupportedAndVisibleByDefault
member.summary: Preview is supported. Control will be created through a call to and updated through calls to . Preview is visible by default.

member.name: F:JetBrains.IDE.TreeBrowser.PreviewSupport.Virtual
member.summary: Virtual preview support. No control will be created by , but calls to will be made so the inheritor can dispatch them to a custom preview mechanism.
